subject: Re: new to group, questions
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
Hi Richard,

I see Misty already informed you were my Youtube videos can be 
located (Thanks, Misty).  That's where I have all my videos showing 
the different projects and research I'm involved with.  
http://www.youtube.com/ufogeek

The video I'm working on now will also be placed on my Youtube page.
I am saving those video files into HD format too (fuller screen).

I don't sell items, or books, or movies.  I'm not into the theatrics 
of the paranormal as some are who produce those "hear a sound then 
run away and scream" type videos and TV shows.
I'm more into the research side, wondering what works and why.  
That's why I come up with some crazy looking devices sometimes.  You 
never know what might just be the right combination.  You have to try 
all you can.

I like to take what is captured in the environment and let it speak 
for itself, so to speak.  The energy imprinted objects I'm 
researching now (subject of the new video) uses a capture file / 
process file system that takes environmental energy (captured with 
numerous non-microphone devices and attempts to get audio from the 
files captured using frequencies to be stimulated by the energy 
captured.
It's a four step process that I'll explain in detail in part 2 of the 
video.

Happy Holidays
- Mike C. (UFO Geek)
http://www.ufogeek.com

--- In EVP-ITC@...m, "shortbuff" <rdmc512@...> wrote:
>
> Hi Mike, Is this going to be something you sell or something that 
can
> be seen on youtube or some other place?
> 
> What Youtube videos of yours can i see now? 
> 
> Thanks,
> 
> Richard
> 
> 
> 
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "M.A. Coletta (Mike)"
> <michaelcoletta@> wrote:
> >
> > Richard, Misty, and all other fellow researchers,
> > 
> > This is a fasinating topic, one that I am currently most 
interested 
> > with as my latest experiment/research project is all about.
> > The crash debris that was sent to 8 researchers, I believe, does 
hold 
> > imprints from a violent past.
> > As does the area where the original crash happened, since there 
are 
> > still amounts of debris scattered around the immediate area, as 
well 
> > as beneath the surface where now stands a memorial.  Not to 
mention 
> > it is the last place where living humans were quickly lost.  Just 
> > imagine the amount of energy that must be imprinted on that exact 
> > spot.
> > 
> > That is where I hoped to gain a better understanding of that 
energy 
> > which is imprinted... and I must say, I think I have done just 
that.
> > 
> > Today I processed a number of the files I captured from the 
impact 
> > point using numerous devices of the non-microphone type.  After I 
put 
> > each of these files through a four step process (which I'll 
explain 
> > in great detail in my video), I was able to listen to some 
amazing, 
> > and very relivent sounds.
> > My wife was so upset after I told her what I had heard, she 
refused 
> > to listen to the audio.
> > 
> > Let me just say... the combination I used was able to capture a 
very 
> > chilling scene.  One I just have to believe were the last moments 
of 
> > those who perished.
> > 
> > Once I publish the final results, I hope others will be able to 
> > verify what I am hearing...
> > 
> > I'm figuring to put a multi-part video on my Youtube page.  One 
part 
> > explaining what will be seen an heard, as well as describing the 
> > events of that day.  Another part with my sessions at the various 
> > locations, using various methods.  And a final part with the 
audio of 
> > the researchers who assisted with this experiment using the 
debris I 
> > sent each of them.
> > 
> > Bottom line... I really do believe that energy is imprinted in 
> > objects, and at locations where energy was strong at a time of 
> > imprint.
> > 
> > Happy Holidays to all.... have a safe and fun Holiday Season!
> > 
> > - Mike C. (UFO Geek)
> > 
> > --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Misty" <bulletbabea@> wrote:
> > >
> > > Richard,
> > >

> > idea

that

> > finger 
> > > may have been removed it still registers under kirlian 
photography 
> > as 
> > > its energy being present.
> > > 
> > > Just because we dont see something or hear a thing doesnt mean 
it 
> > is 
> > > nonexistant =) Perhaps it just means we are deaf and blind to 
its 
> > > existence.
> > > 
> > > Misty
> > >

> > > > 
> > > > Years ago I watched a slide show featuring several photo's 
taken 
> > via
> > > > kirlian photography. It seems kirlian photography captures 
certain
> > > > types of energy on film. In the demonstration a picture of a 
> > house 
> > > was
> > > > shown. Later that same house had a fire and part of the house 
had 
> > > been
> > > > burned to the ground but the photo taken with kirlian 
photography
> > > > later showed that part of the house still there.
> > > > 
> > > > I'm no expert but maybe energy we can't see leaves an imprint 
in 
> > the
> > > > non physical universe and can be viewed or demonstrated using 
the
> > > > right instruments and technique. Of course I really have no 
clue 
> > and
> > > > am fascinated by the evp and itc phenomena.

> > > > Richard
